#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;
int main()
{int T; scanf("%d",&T);
   while(T--)
    {int n,s,p,c=0;
     cin>>n;
    for (int i=1; i<=n; i++)
    {
        for (int j=i+1; j<=n; j++)
        {
            s = i+j;
            p = i*j;
            if ((p%s)==0){c++;}
        }
    }
    cout<<c<<"\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
